lines.text: Forgive me, Father, for I have sinned. It has been three months since my last confession. I've disobeyed my parents many times. I've taken the Lord's name in vain many times. I've had sinful relations, with boys at my school. Many boys, many times.
My child, these are great sins. You must prepare yourself for the consequences.
Father, there's just one more thing.
What is it, my poor child?
I loved every minute of it.

[final line]
Hey, kids. They're playing our song... Let's cruise.

[possessed by Mary Lou]
BE GONE! COME ON! There's no God, Buddy! And there is no Heaven, and do you know what pissed me off the most? NO FUCKING WINGS!
You shut your fucking mouth, bitch!

[Vicki possessed by Mary Lou, singing]
A wop baba loo bop, wop bam-
[a row of lockers slam together, killing Monica]

[during sex behind the stage]
What do you go out with that square for anyway?
Because he treats me right, and his daddy's rich. Rich enough to make Billy cool.
So, why do you go out with me?
Because it's a big free country.
Oh! God Bless America!
It's not who you come with, it's who takes you home.
Cracking up?
[Vicky slaps Mary Lou across her face]

[Walt sees Vicki dressed in a glittery turquoise prom dress, a ton of 1950's-styled makeup on her face, her hair held in place with bobby pins]
You look beautiful! Your mother and I thought we were the best-looking couple at our prom. I had my first job, repossessing cars, and my first paycheck went to buying your mom a rose corsage. You'll remember this night forever.

[seductively, as Mary-Lou]
Ooh, I hope so... hold me, Daddy!
[Vicki passionately kisses Walt, and with a surprised look on his face, he returns the kiss]
What are you DOING?... What have you DONE!
[Walt and Vicki pull away, and Walt wipes his mouth off with his hand as Vicki steps past her mother]
Jesse-belle! Harlot!
Life's a joke, then you croak.
Places to go, people to kill!
Who won?
I'm not supposed to tell, IT WASN'T YOU.
Forgive me Father, for I have sinned. I have done terrible things. I have hurt my friends. I have given into sexual desires with my boyfriend. I don't know what's happening to me.
We all stray from the path of the Lord sometimes, child. But with penance, you will find your way again.
Will you help me Father?
Of course, child.
Will you pray for me?
Yes.
Will you fuck me?

[Josh frowns after Kelly throws a dart at his Einstein poster, hitting the Albert Einstein photo right in the nose]
Sorry, big guy.
[Josh removes the dart]

[Bill sees that Buddy has been killed and buried in Mary-Lou's grave]
Stupid BASTARD!
[Bill hugs Buddy in grief]

[bouncing up and down on top of Josh]
Don't you wanna FUCK ME?
[giggles psychotically]

[Josh yelps in disgust and pushes Vicki, unintentionally making her fall on the floor. In concern, he hurries to her side]
Vicki...
WRONG.
[Possessed by Mary-Lou, Vicki squeezes Josh's neck and slams him up against the wall with ease]
[repeated line]
Seeya later, alligator.
